name: Under Your Wing
description:
After a rumbling rockslide, you wake up to complete darkness.. When you strike a match to light your lantern, you find yourself trapped in a coal mine. There is no other option, than to try to find your way back out. All by yourself.. Or not?

'Under Your Wing' is a 2d platform/puzzle game set in a dark but mystical world. It is a game about perseverance, discovery and friendship.
